trans-unit.source: Exposes a data item in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 公開 （expose) 中的資料項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Data items that are not also <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types do not have children; however, they can have a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree and a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: 資料的項目也不是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>類型沒有子系，不過，它們可以<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>樹狀目錄和對應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> can have a collection of strings that contain data items.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>可以擁有包含資料項目的字串集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When those items are processed by an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> for visualization, a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree is created for them.
trans-unit.target: 當這些項目會處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>視覺效果中，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>為其建立樹狀結構。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: This tree can have a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: 此樹狀結構可以具有對應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: After the tree is created, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] merges the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree into a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: 樹狀目錄中建立之後，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]合併<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>樹狀到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: ItemAutomationPeer works with its <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> counterpart, if it exists, to obtain more information about the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree.
trans-unit.target: ItemAutomationPeer 搭配其<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>對應項目，如果存在的話，以取得詳細資訊，關於<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>樹狀目錄。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Only visible data items, or more precisely, the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> trees, have this dualism.
trans-unit.target: 只有可見的資料或項目，更精確地說，對應<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>樹狀目錄，擁有這個 dualism。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Non-visible data items, which have no corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> trees, have only one ItemAutomationPeer.
trans-unit.target: 不可見的資料，這些項目有對應的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>樹，有一個 ItemAutomationPeer。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別值由衍生類別的建構函式呼叫時的初始設定。

trans-unit.source: The data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資料中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>與此相關聯的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that holds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>保存<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得快速鍵<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>對應中的資料項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>與此相關聯的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的存取金鑰<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>對應中的資料項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>與此相關聯的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: 便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得可唯一識別字串<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>對應中的資料項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>與此相關聯的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]識別碼是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>屬性未設定，值為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>表示指定的週框矩形<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 週框。

trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> ，代表位於指定的可點選空間<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 取得描述的功能的字串<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>對應中的資料項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>與此相關聯的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: 說明文字。

trans-unit.target: 取得字串，表示指定的視覺狀態<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>對應至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>與這個<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>相關聯的集合</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>中的資料項目</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: 狀態。

trans-unit.source: Examples include "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: 範例包括 「 忙碌 」 或 「 上線 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the type of item that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得人類看得懂的字串，其中包含的型別項目指定<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>代表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>對應至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>與這個<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>相關聯的集合</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>中的資料項目</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The item type.
trans-unit.target: 項目類型。

trans-unit.source: An example includes "Mail Message" or "Contact".
trans-unit.target: 範例包括 「 郵件訊息 」 或 「 連絡人 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>也就是以指定目標<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>對應至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>與這個<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>相關聯的集合</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>中的資料項目</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref>的目標項目的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的文字標籤<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>對應中的資料項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>與此相關聯的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain which control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: 如同一般的使用者用來說明他們要參考的控制項的文字字串，您可以將名稱屬性。

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您擁有中的所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，您可以透過程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text label.
trans-unit.target: 文字標籤。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> is laid out in a particular direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>依特定方向配置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>對應至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>與這個<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>相關聯的集合</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>中的資料項目</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The direction of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的方向<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the method returns <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> is not laid out in a particular direction.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 方法會傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>不以特定方向配置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回支援與此 automation peer 相關聯的項目之指定的控制項模式的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the item is not in the visual tree, this method returns a `this` pointer.
trans-unit.target: 如果`patternInterface`是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>和項目不是視覺化樹狀結構中，則這個方法會傳回`this`指標。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果`patternInterface`等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>，這個方法會傳回該物件會實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定的控制項模式的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果支援控制項模式的物件 patternInterface 是支援的值，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>目前具有鍵盤輸入焦點。

trans-unit.source: The user might understand the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會指出項目是否可見。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，項目會顯示在螢幕上，但仍看不到。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果項目會隱藏其他項目，它可能無法顯示。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>不在畫面中; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: 將虛擬項目完全可為使用者介面自動化項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>
